wybug_title: 长宽dns管理不当存在域传送问题
wybug_type: 系统/服务运维配置不当
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-01-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-01-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-02-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-02-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-02-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-03-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 长宽的dns没有禁止域传输，可以暴露所有的域名以及主机信息，所以一个isp来说，还是很危险的 详细说明：  域没有进行限制配置，可以暴露内部所有域名和主机信息，如下：
dig @dns.xmgwbn.com xmgwbn.com axfr; <<>> DiG 9.3.6-P1-RedHat-9.3.6-4.P1.el5_4.2 <<>> @dns.xmgwbn.com xmgwbn.com axfr; (1 server found);; global options:  printcmdxmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	SOA	dns.xmgwbn.com. root.dns.xmgwbn.com. 2006121801 10800 3600 604800 86400xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	NS	dns.xmgwbn.com.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	NS	dns1.xmgwbn.com.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.1blog.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.37cj.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	33.36.74.7dns.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.1dns1.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.20flash.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39ftp1.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.57ftp2.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.58game.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.53gowebcall.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	58.22.151.236kd.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	10.10.10.34kefu.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.60mrtg.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.6mrtg2.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	10.10.10.1pc.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39phone.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.161.46.121shop.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39skycn.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.42ts.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.227.19www.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.33xmyy.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39yslt.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39yw.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	10.10.10.33zfw.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.61zfw1.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.61xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	SOA	dns.xmgwbn.com. root.dns.xmgwbn.com. 2006121801 10800 3600 604800 86400
   漏洞证明：  
dig @dns.xmgwbn.com xmgwbn.com axfr; <<>> DiG 9.3.6-P1-RedHat-9.3.6-4.P1.el5_4.2 <<>> @dns.xmgwbn.com xmgwbn.com axfr; (1 server found);; global options:  printcmdxmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	SOA	dns.xmgwbn.com. root.dns.xmgwbn.com. 2006121801 10800 3600 604800 86400xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	NS	dns.xmgwbn.com.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	NS	dns1.xmgwbn.com.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.1blog.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.37cj.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	33.36.74.7dns.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.1dns1.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.20flash.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39ftp1.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.57ftp2.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.58game.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.53gowebcall.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	58.22.151.236kd.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	10.10.10.34kefu.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.60mrtg.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.6mrtg2.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	10.10.10.1pc.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39phone.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.161.46.121shop.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39skycn.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.42ts.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.227.19www.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.33xmyy.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39yslt.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.39yw.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	10.10.10.33zfw.xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	A	211.162.32.61zfw1.xmgwbn.com.	172800	IN	A	211.162.32.61xmgwbn.com.		172800	IN	SOA	dns.xmgwbn.com. root.dns.xmgwbn.com. 2006121801 10800 3600 604800 86400
   修复方案：  对可传输的ip进行限制，建议内部其他域名系统也进行检查   版权声明：转载请注明来源 堕落大哥@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：3  确认时间：2013-01-22 10:24 厂商回复： CNVD确认漏洞并复现所述情况，已由CNVD通过网站公开联系方式联系网站管理方处置。rank=3 最新状态： 暂无
